law.text: The county clerk shall be entitled to receive from the Internal Revenue Service a fee pursuant to KRS 64.012 for each notice of tax lien so filed, and a like fee for each lien discharged.
law.history: Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 84, sec. 17, effective June 17, 1978. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4281t-12.
